Plot: “A thrilling sequel... Franko has me hooked.” – Independent Book Review What would you do if you got away with murder? Would you stop there? Could you? Susie and Roy thought that they committed the perfect crime. Their planning was meticulous. Their execution was flawless. But, there is always a loose end, isn’t there? Always a singing bone. Now, while enemies multiply and suspicions abound, their perfect world begins to crumble. The hunters have become the hunted. "...one of the most intricate, well thought out and executed crime novels I've ever read..." - Amazon Top 100 Reviewer
